parameters.name: BusinessType
parameters.description:
The log category. Valid values:

*   dcdn_log_access_l1 (default): access logs.
*   dcdn_log_er: Edge Routine logs.
*   dcdn_log_waf: firewall logs.
*   dcdn_log_ipa: TCP/UDP proxy logs.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.
